snippet: The money raised from the prints, all donated, will go to form a fund to support the three children of Anton Hammerl, a South African photographer who was killed last year in Libya
abstract: The money raised from the prints, all donated, will go to form a fund to support the three children of Anton Hammerl, a South African photographer who was killed last year in Libya

headline.main: Auction of Photojournalism to Benefit Family of Slain Photographer
headline.print_headline: A Benefit Auction For Photographer’s Family
